package main

extern func print(string)

extern func itoa(int) string

type X int

func (x *X) incr() X {
  *x++
  return *x
}

#init
func main() {
  parts := [...]string{
    "a",
    "b",
    "c",
    "d",
    "e",
    "f",
  }

  print(join(parts))
}

func join(parts [6]string) string {
  var str string
  for i := 0; i < len(parts); i++ {
    str += parts[i]
    if i < len(parts)-1 {
      str += ", "
    }
  }

  return str
}
---
a, b, c, d, e, f
